description: Zane Truesdale, known in Japan as Marufuji Ryou, or "Kaiser Ryou", is the top Duelist of Duel Academy in Jaden`s first year, Zane serves as one of Jaden`s rivals during the series` first season, though he takes a more brutal approach to dueling after experiencing a transformation of mind in the second. In subsequent seasons he develops fatal heart conditions and seeks an opponent worthy enough to give him his final and greatest duel before he expires. (Though in both versions after dying due to his loss to Yubel he is revived when Jaden`s soul fuses with Yubel.)
name: Marufuji Ryou
